text: Lots of food around here but it is very busy with alot of workers sitting and picnic on the floor outside the mall. I'm not sure if it is normal here but yes sometimes i feel nervous walking past them as they will keep staring. Just because i'm an introvert. I mean overall it is a good place to grab some food.
The Scarlett located here has the best spread of food options. 6 ‚≠ê

Very clean, very controlled and shopping mall living. You will never go hungry! There are countless restaurants but only a few bars for drinking. Great for shopping clothes. Pedicures are great too üòÅ
Parking is cheaper here than other malls located in this vicinity. Pretty small mall, mostly filled with restaurants rather than outlets and shops.
Nice roof top view from the mall.
